com.seamless.ers.client.externalws
Interface ERSClientInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
TestServer
public interface ERSClientInterface

Interface for accessing ERS functions from external (untrusted) clients.
This is foremost a simplified interface for clients that wants to use basic ERS functionality. It is particularly fitting for cash register integrations, web applications and simple POS terminals.

Author:
kent

cancelTransaction

Response cancelTransaction(ClientContext context,
                           ClientTransactionData transactionData,
                           java.lang.String ersReference,
                           java.lang.String verificationCode,
                           java.lang.String reasonCode,
                           java.lang.String reason)
Cancels a transactions previously performed by this client This operation might not be supported for some products and some products will require a separate verification code when cancelling It is also possible that the cancellation will not be completed until it is approved by support manually at a later time.

Parameters:
context - The client context
transactionData - The transaction specific data provided by the client
ersReference - The ERS reference for the transaction
verificationCode - The verification code for the cancellation, if required
reason - The code for categorizing the reason for the cancellation
reason - Text describing the reason for requesting the voucher to be cancelled
Returns:

reserveVoucher

Response reserveVoucher(ClientContext context,
                        ClientTransactionData transactionData,
                        java.lang.String productId)
Validates a pending voucher purchase (checking credit limit etc) and reserves a voucher. If this call succeeds, a buyReservedVoucher() request (refering to this reservation) should be almost guaranteed to complete successfully.

Parameters:
context - The client context
transactionData - The transaction specific data provided by the client
productId - The id of the product to purchase (see product id:s for format)
Returns:
The response data for this reservation

Prepares a pending topup operation

Parameters:
context - The client context
transactionData - The transaction specific data provided by the client
productId - The id of the product to purchase (see product id:s for format)
accountId - The account id (typically a phone number) of the account to topup
amount - The amount to topup
isAccountIdMSISDN - A flag specify if the accountId is MSISDN
isDirectTopup - A flag specify if a receiver performs topup by himself, such as ATM channel
Returns:

                                 java.lang.String reportId,

                                 ERSHashtableParameter parameters)
Execute a ERS report

Parameters:
context - The client context
transactionData - The transaction specific data provided by the client
reportId - ERS report ID
language - the language used for report layout using ISO 639-1 codes.

buyVouchers

BuyVouchersResponseData buyVouchers(ClientContext context,
                                    ClientTransactionData transactionData,
                                    java.lang.String productId,
                                    int count,
                                    boolean reportAsSoldOnDirectly)
Buys multiple vouchers in one request

Parameters:
context - The client context
transactionData - The transaction specific data provided by the client
productId - The id of the product to purchase (see product id:s for format)
count - The number of vouchers to buy of this product
reportAsSoldOnDirectly - If the vouchers should be reported as sold on directly, if not the client should later on call reportSoldVouchers() to report when they were actually sold on
Returns:

reportVouchersSoldOn

Response reportVouchersSoldOn(ClientContext context,
                              ClientTransactionData transactionData,
                              java.util.Vector<VoucherSaleData> salesData)
Reports vouchers that have been sold on by the client or by one of its clients etc

Parameters:
context - The client context
transactionData - The transaction specific data provided by the client
salesData - List of VoucherSaleData informing the ers for each voucher that was sold on
Returns:

                                        java.lang.String subscriberMSISDN)
Get information about a subscriber including balance on available accounts.

Parameters:
context - The client context
subscriberMSISDN -
Returns:
A response object containing the subscriber MSISDN, account balance and other subscriber specific information for a subscriber.

requestAdminUserTransaction

Response requestAdminUserTransaction(ClientContext context,
                                     AdminUserOperation operation,
                                     AdminUser adminUser,
                                     java.lang.String adminPassword)
Perform a specific operation on the adminUser.

Parameters:
context - The client context
operation - Operation type to be performed on aminUser
adminUser - The user on which the operation should be performed
adminPassword - Required when adding a new adminUser or when changing a password for adminUser
Returns:
A response object with the result of the operation
